name: the-invisible-users
description: Designing the Web for AI Agents and Everyone Else - Book manuscript and Web Audit Suite implementation

scripts.lint:markdown: markdownlint --config config/.markdownlint.json --ignore CHANGELOG.md README.md CLAUDE.md LEARNINGS.md docs/for-ai/*.md docs/architecture/*.md docs/shared-chapters/*.md packages/sales-enablement/**/*.md packages/web-audit-suite/**/*.md --ignore packages/web-audit-suite/node_modules
scripts.lint:markdown:fix: markdownlint --config config/.markdownlint.json --ignore CHANGELOG.md --fix README.md CLAUDE.md LEARNINGS.md docs/for-ai/*.md docs/architecture/*.md docs/shared-chapters/*.md packages/sales-enablement/**/*.md packages/web-audit-suite/**/*.md --ignore packages/web-audit-suite/node_modules
scripts.lint:markdown:all: markdownlint --config config/.markdownlint.json '**/*.md' --ignore CHANGELOG.md --ignore node_modules --ignore packages/web-audit-suite/node_modules --ignore packages/bible --ignore packages/dont-make-ai-think --ignore packages/mx-handbook --ignore packages/shared-appendices --ignore packages/shared-code-examples --ignore .claude --ignore docs/repo --ignore config --ignore books --ignore blogs --ignore outputs
scripts.illustrations:generate: node scripts/download-cover-images.js && cd packages/bible/illustrations && for svg in *.svg; do png="${svg%.svg}.png"; echo "Converting $svg to $png..."; magick convert -density 300 -background white -alpha remove -alpha off -depth 8 "$svg" "$png" 2>/dev/null || convert -density 300 -background white -alpha remove -alpha off -depth 8 "$svg" "$png"; done && echo "✓ All PNG illustrations generated (8-bit RGB)"
scripts.pdf:bible-html: pandoc packages/bible/chapters/executive-summary.md packages/bible/chapters/preface.md packages/bible/chapters/chapter-*.md packages/bible/chapters/Glossary.md packages/bible/chapters/The-End.md -o outputs/the-bible/mx-bible.html --resource-path=packages/bible--standalone --toc --toc-depth=2 --metadata title='MX-Bible' --metadata subtitle='Designing the Web for AI Agents and Everyone Else' --metadata author='Tom Cranstoun' --metadata date='January 2026' && echo '✓ HTML generated: outputs/the-bible/mx-bible.html (open and print to PDF using ⌘+P)'
